Keywords: Arkham Asylum , Gotham City Underworld , Monster , Scientist , Sinestro Corps
Real Name: Jonathan Crane
Special Powers
WELCOME TO THE SINESTRO CORPS: Perplex. When Scarecrow uses Perplex to target an opposing character, after resolutions you may generate a hindering terrain marker in their square.
FEAR SPREADING GAS: Giant Reach: 3, Poison. Smoke Cloud as FREE, but only to generate 2 markers. // FREE: Roll a d6. This turn, Scarecrow can use the listed effect and, when he does, it instead targets all opposing characters that occupy one of his generated markers, regardless of range, adjacency or line of fire.
*1-3: Outwit
*4-6: Mind Control
AVATAR OF FEAR: Willpower. // Opposing characters within range using Willpower only succeed on a 6.

Comments
January 15, 2023
TheClixCave
I'm not sold. He's a lot of points for what the non-prime does better. Without tk he struggles to get his smokes in position, and then you only have a 50% chance of getting to even use mind Control. I don't think he's all negatives though. I enjoy that he can drop smokes, perplex, then running shot behind a wall to mind Control out of prob range/line of sight. You can also give him the sinestro Corp ring and pop out constructs. Definitely going to give him some more tries, but he is a tad underwhelming for his points.
January 14, 2023
BLsquared
Played against him on an Arkham team, and man he definitely pulled his weight. Great and fun figure with the right setup and board control. Remember: he gets to Mind Control three people at once if you line it up right, and maybe even more since the markers he places with Perplex don't go away. Solid Scarecrow.
January 11, 2023
TheClixCave
Feels like this guy would've been decent if he got to use the Mind Control as FREE. As it stands, he can't get to the position he wants to be in to use the mind control without using his action.
